metadata.title: CVE-2014-9253 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
The default file type whitelist configuration in conf/mime.conf in theMedia Manager in DokuWiki before 2014-09-29b allows remote attackers toexecute arbitrary web script or HTML by uploading an SWF file, thenaccessing it via the media parameter to lib/exe/fetch.php.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2014-9253` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

dokuwiki - 0.0.20140929.d-1ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: dokuwiki package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.0.20140929.d-1ubuntu1').
